content:
MOving this to its own thread.... otherwise I'll lose it.... https://chat.fhir.org/#narrow/stream/229922-Da.2BVinci.2BPDex.2BPlan-Net/topic/Custom.20NUCC.20Taxonomy.20Codes/near/230423315

The description of the name field is: "Description of service as presented to a consumer while searching"

The search parameter description is: Select HealthcareServices with the specified name.
It allows search using the exact or contains modifiers.

Personally, I would expect that most searches or healthcareService would be by organization, category and specialty, the IG supports a search by name. Looks like the imaginative folks who built the sample data used in the reference implementation (see https://github.com/HL7-DaVinci/pdex-plan-net-sample-data) used the organization name.
